page.title: 02ASHWELLTHORPE'S DEVELOPMENT
page.content: {Ashwellthorpe}has been allowed to grow over the last 2 decades with an enlivening influx of mobile urban new- comers who have altered & revitalised the static structure of a remote rural community.The social ease which this has generated is in sharp contrast to a feudal village which until 1918 had been dominated for centuries & prac- tically owned by the occupants of Ash- wellthorpe Hall.Very few babies were born in the 1950s.Some 80 children now attend schools outside the village. {Every year Father Xmas comes from Fun- {denhall in a spellbinding fairy-tale {cart trimmed with lights & drawn by a {white pony.He gives chocolate to {children waiting in the darkness all {along The Street.}In 1977 more than 250 parishioners gathered on the green in front of the church for a Jubilee photograph.
